item.description:
Hello Trailblazers! We will be having a bonfire party at my house. Please bring items that you would like to cook on the fire to share (a potluck)--hamburgers, hotdogs, etc.

If anyone has any musical instruments that they would like to play please bring them, I will bring my guitar. We will be joined by other meetup groups.

We'll be outside but have access to the bathroom in the house. We have a large picnic table there but please bring your chairs!

Party starts at 6 pm. If anyone wants to learn how to build a bonfire I will be there at 5 pm, so if you want to give me a hand I would appreciate it. Please do not bring any wood to burn--I have plenty.

If you have a chair, please bring that.

This will be a potluck event so please bring something to cook over the fire or that you've made. Please no potato chips or twinkies, just real food.

Check this web site for rescheduling in case of bad weather.

My house is actually on "30 Long Pond Road" which is right next to 12 Hampshire Ave. My road is brand new so it might not appear on someone's GPS or mapquest.

Look for the tiki torches at the begining of the driveway.

See you there!

Peter

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Bonfire / Potluck cookout
